name: Freedom's Toast
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M/DF (a small amount of ale in a flagon)
text: When the caster hoists a flagon and delivers a toast to freedom, the target is transported up to 15 feet from its position to a space of your choice, though that space must be within your line of sight. If the target was prone at the time of casting, you can choose for the target to be standing upon reaching the destination. Furthermore, if the target was bound with non-magical ropes, manacles, or other restraints, those restraints are not transported with the target, effectively freeing the target from those restraints. If the target is bound by magical restraints, you can bar those restraints from being transported with the target with a successful caster level check against a DC based on the restraints' caster level (DC = 11 + the restraining magic item's or spell's caster level).
components_zh: 语言，姿势,，材料/法器（一小壶麦酒）
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你举起酒壶大喊“干了啦！”，于是一个盟友立刻获得自由并被传送到15尺范围外你指定的一个位置，这个位置必须在你的视线之内。如果目标在被传送时处于俯卧状态，你可以指定让他在被传送后处于站立状态。除此之外，如果目标被非魔法的锁镣或绳子及其他物体束缚住，那么他自动获得自由；如果束缚物有魔法性质，那么施法者需要和增强束缚物的施法者进行一个施法者等级对抗，DC=（11+束缚物或制造者的施法者等级）。
